SOY-FREE VEGAN PROTEIN SMOOTHIE BOWL

A vibrant, creamy smoothie bowl made with pea protein for a soy-free vegan breakfast. Topped with fresh fruit, seeds, and coconut for 30g plant-based protein.

30g
Protein
380
Calories
10m
Total Time
1
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bowl

Carbs45g
Fat10g
Fiber8g
Sugar20g
Sodium150mg
DifficultyBeginner

INGREDIENTS

  • 2 frozen bananas
  • 150g frozen mixed berries
  • 60g (2 scoops) vanilla pea protein powder
  • 120ml coconut milk
  • 30g almond butter
  • Toppings: sliced banana, berries, hemp seeds, coconut flakes, chia seeds

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Blend

Add frozen bananas, berries, protein powder, coconut milk, and almond butter to a high-speed blender.

2

Process

Blend until thick and creamy, scraping sides as needed. The consistency should be thicker than a smoothie.

3

Pour

Transfer to a bowl.

4

Top

Arrange toppings in rows: sliced banana, berries, hemp seeds, coconut flakes, and chia seeds.
